talent_description: You have made a study of arcane lore and magic items.
You know how to kill quickly and efficiently.
You use your rage as a weapon.
You are a master of speed and precision on the battlefield.
You have a talent for elemental magic. Choose one of the following magic talents to be your favored arcana: Air Arcana, Earth Arcana, Fire Arcana, or Water Arcana.
You know how to protect others.
You are the elite of mounted warriors.
You suffer no arcane evil to live.
You have a naturally affinity for healing magic.
You know how to fight with panache.
You meld the arts of magic and swordsmanship.
